::Spears::

She hears the transmission and replied, "Hey, there are plenty of 
preds to slag. Join in,"

She ran outside with her spear ready.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "David Torrey" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
> (OOC: I want to help defend the Ark, so please reply to this post.)
> 
> 
> ::Wolveritron::
> 
>       "Do any Maximals need help with fighting, my servos are 
itching for a good fight," Wolveritron said into his comm unit. He 
hoped something would happen soon.
